structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES

law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1984 -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 407, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Exception to auditing requirement for city which receives and expends $25,000 or less in fiscal year.
